# init(poses:)

**Initializer**

Creates a component value with the provided poses.

## Declaration

```swift
init(poses: [SkeletalPose])
```

## Parameters

- **poses**: The pose values, arranged in any order of your choosing.

## Discussion
title: init(poses:)
